Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Office Space for lease at the Western Sarnia-Lambton Research Park. The Research Park has served as a strong link between concept and commerce, and a key contributor to the movement of an idea or a discovery from the lab bench to the marketplace. The Research Park's Commercialization Centre is Canadas largest clean-tech incubator, focused on large-scale industrial technology. Conference facilities at the Park play host to a number of local, regional, and national events each year. Tenants range from large multi-national companies to non-profit organizations, to small start-up companies and commercialization projects. 16,000 SQFT is available for lease at Building 1020. Asking for $12.50 Net rent Per Squarefoot plus $8.50 in additional rents that include utilities. Please contact the listing broker for more information.
